import React from'react';import'./Keyboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const KEYBOARD_ROWS=[['Q','W','E','R','T','Y','U','I','O','P'],['A','S','D','F','G','H','J','K','L'],['ENTER','Z','X','C','V','B','N','M','DELETE']];function Keyboard(_ref){let{onKeyPress,onEnter,onDelete,letterStates,disabled,lockedLetters}=_ref;const handleClick=key=>{if(disabled)return;if(key==='ENTER'){onEnter();}else if(key==='DELETE'){onDelete();}else{// Check if letter is locked before allowing click
